PropertyList.name: Chinese: Keyboard
PropertyList.description: huan ying kai che zhe ge jiao cheng gei ni duan zan de shuo ming jian pan Shang yi xie jian de gong neng.

step.message: huan ying show kan followme e-tron de jiao cheng
di 3 ji: jian pan
xing xi chu xian hou, qing shi yi shi an jian.
di yi bu fen: kai che yong jian
w jian shi you men, zai fa dong ji qi dong de qing kuang xia ke yi rang che zi qian jing
s jian shi sha che, ke yi rang che jian su huo ting zhi
a jian shi zuo zhuan, zhi you che liang zai yi ding su du de shi hou cai neng zhuan wan
d jian shi you zhuan, zhi you che liang zai yi ding su du de shi hou cai neng zhuan wan
shift>b jian shi shou sha kuai jie jian
di er bu fen: deng guang
[ jian shi yong yu da kai zuo zhi shi deng de
] jian shi yong yu da kai you zhi shi deng de
f jian shi yong yu da kai suo you zhi shi deng de
l jian shi yong yu da kai qian deng de, you san zhong gong lü ke gong xuan ze
k jian shi yong yu da kai yuan guang deng de
j jian shi yong yu shan yuan guang deng de
di san bu fen: qi ta gong neng
kong ge jan shi yong yu ming di de
di si bu fen: zi dong jia shi
c jian shi yong yu qi dong kai che chao su xi tong de
e jian she long yu qi dong zi dong sheng tian xi tong de
jian pan jiu shi zhe yang le
ru xu yao geng du bang zhu, qing cha kan Help > Aircraft Help menu
ni ye ke yi cha kan Help > Common Aircraft Keys
ru xu yao geng duo bang zhu, qing cha kan qi ta liang ge jiao cheng.
zhu ning jia shi yu kuai!
